task.title: Butter Pecan Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: A recipe for making butter pecan ice cream with the ice cream machine. This recipe will make about 6.5 cups, or 10-12 servings.

taskbody.context: You'll need these ingredients- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 cup pecan halves, 1 teaspoon kosher salt + pinch, 1 ¼ cups whole milk, 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 ½ cups heavy cream, 2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract.

substep.cmd: Melt your butter in a medium skillet
Add the pecans and 1 teaspoon of salt
Cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until pecans are golden brown(This should take about 6-8 minutes)
Remove the pecans from heat, strain and reserve, allowing them to chill before adding to the ice cream
Using a hand mixer on low speed or a whisk, mix together the milk, sugar and pinch of salt in a medium bowl until the sugar completely dissolves
Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours or overnight
Uncover the mixture and whisk again
Pour the mixture into the spout and cover the cap, letting it mix until thickened

step.cmd: When the ice cream is fully churned, gradually add the pecans and allow it to mix together thoroughly
If a firmer consistency is desired, you may transfer the ice cream to an airtight container and place in the freezer for about 2 hours

substep.cmd: Make sure to let the ice cream sit out after freezing for at least 15 minutes before serving
